S04n527:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśatairabhijñātābhijñātaiḥ sthavirairmahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvairarhadbhiḥ |
S04n527:6: mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena ca revatena ca śuddhipanthakena ca nandena ca ānandena ca rāhulena ca gavāṃpatinā ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena ca aniruddhena ca |
S04n527:18: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayati sma-asti śāriputra paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhākṣetrāṇāmatikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ |
S04n527:19: tatra amitāyurnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04n527:20: dharmaṃ ca deśayati tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate ?
S04n527:21: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkham |
S04n527:24: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhirvedikābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ kiṅkiṇījālaiśca samalaṃkṛtā samantato'nupatikṣiptā citrā darśanīyā caturṇāṃ ratnānām |
S04n527:27: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ-tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasya aśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya |
S04n527:29: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samantāccaturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānām-tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya |
S04n527:30: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samantādratnavṛkṣā jātāścitrā darśanīyāḥ saptānāṃ ratnānām-tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasyāśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya |
S04n527:31: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu santi padmāni jātāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni nīlanidarśanāni |
S04n527:37: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni tūryāṇi |
S04n527:39: tatra ca buddhakṣetre triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇām |
S04n527:40: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste ekena purobhaktena koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vandanti anyāllokadhātūn gatvā |
S04n527:41: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhirabhyavakīrya punarapi tāmeva lokadhātumāgacchanti divāvihārāya |
S04n527:43: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre santi haṃsāḥ krauñcā mayūrāśca |
S04n527:44: te triṣkṛtvo rātro triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvanti sma,
S04n527:47: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate,
S04n527:53: nāmāpi śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti,
S04n527:55: te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghāstenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayanti |
S04n527:57: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati-tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṅgikasya divyasya tūryasya cāryaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S04n527:58: evameva śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati |
S04n527:59: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati,
S04n527:63: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato'mitāyurnāmocyate ?
S04n527:64: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmaparimitamāyuḥpramāṇam |
S04n527:66: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya || 8 ||
S04n527:67: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato'mitābho nāmocyate ?
S04n527:68: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhā apratihatā sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu |
S04n527:70: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇamākhyātuṃ śuddhānāmarhatām |
S04n527:72: punaraparaṃ śāriputra ye amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapannāḥ śuddhā bodhisattvā avinivartanīyā ekajātipratibaddhāsteṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇamākhyātumanyatrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā iti gacchanti |
S04n527:73: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyam |
S04n527:75: yatra hi nāma tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati |
S04n527:76: nāvaramātrakeṇa śāriputra kuśalamūlena amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyante |
S04n527:77: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati,
S04n527:79: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati,
S04n527:80: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati,
S04n527:81: tasya kālaṃ kurvataḥ so'mitāyustathāgataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtaḥ purataḥ sthāsyati |
S04n527:83: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate |
S04n527:84: tasmāttarhi śāriputra idamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāna eva vadāmi-satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kartavyam || 10 ||
S04n527:85: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi,
S04n527:86: evameva śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāmerurnāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato mañjudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:87: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:89: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi candrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho nāma tathāgato mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma tathāgato'nantavīryo nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:90: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:92: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi amitāyurnāma tathāgato'mitaskandho nāma tathāgato'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato mahāratnaketurnāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:93: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:95: evamuttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato dundubhisvaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgataḥ ādityasaṃbhavo nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:96: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra uttarāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:98: evamadhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nāma tathāgato dharmadharo nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:99: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra adhastāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:101: evamupariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo nāma tathāgata indraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gandhottamo nāma tathāgato gandhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskandho nāma tathāgato ratnakusumasaṃpuṣpitagātro nāma tathāgataḥ sālendrarājo nāma tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśī nāma tathāgataḥ sumerukalpo nāma tathāgataḥ |
S04n527:102: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
S04n527:104: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate ?
S04n527:105: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04n527:106: teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04n527:109: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām |
S04n527:110: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04n527:115: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ || 17 ||
S04n527:116: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi,
S04n527:117: evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti |
S04n527:119: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kleśakaṣāye || 18 ||
S04n527:120: tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye || 19 ||
S04n527:122: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan || 20 ||
